div.head: Boundary Dispute between the Barizaniates and the Lizaviates

p.seg: An otherwise unknown individual, most likely a first-century governor of Dalmatia, appointed a iudex to deliver a verdict (sententia) in this boundary dispute between two otherwise unknown peoples.

div.p: ... ]s Bassus (propraetorian imperial legate) ordered Caius Plotius Maximus to make a judgment in the boundary matter between the Barizaniates and the Lizaviates ... and instructed that he should deliver a verdict concerning the placement of boundary markers.
